subject:
Re: svn commit: samba r23241 - in branches: SAMBA_3_0/source/smbd
	SAMBA_3_0_26/source/smbd
body:
On Thu, May 31, 2007 at 05:15:14PM +0200, Volker Lendecke wrote:
> 
> Sorry for not responding in time, I have to take care of a
> Linuxtag booth and a talk today.

No problem. My Google talk was today also.

> Certainly you're 100% right. If you find the time, can you
> check that in?

Done. BTW: I've finished reviewing the patches you put in this
week and they look fine - can't see any issues with them. Thanks
for doing this abstraction work.

Jeremy.
